About.history_text: Altus Ink was born from a passion for tattoo art and a commitment to excellence. Founded by Danilo Santos, a former police officer who left his career to follow his dream, we are now an international reference in quality and professionalism.
About.mission_text: To transform skin into art, ensuring a premium experience from start to finish. Every tattoo is unique, every client is special.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Get all your questions answered about our services
FAQ.contact_text: Contact us via WhatsApp, email or phone

items.question: How does booking work?
items.answer: You choose the artist, style, date, and available time through our online system. After paying the 30% deposit via credit card or PIX, your booking is automatically confirmed and you receive a confirmation email.

items.question: What is the deposit value?
items.answer: The deposit is 30% of the estimated total tattoo value. This amount is deducted from the final payment. The deposit guarantees your spot and covers preparation costs and materials.

items.question: Can I reschedule my session?
items.answer: Yes, up to 48h in advance without additional costs. Contact us via WhatsApp, email, or phone to reschedule. Rescheduling with less than 48h may incur a 50% deposit fee.

items.question: What is the refund policy?
items.answer: The deposit is 100% refundable if cancellation is made more than 7 days in advance. Between 7 and 3 days: 50% refund. Less than 3 days: no refund. In case of cancellation by the studio, immediate full refund.

items.question: How long does a session take?
items.answer: It depends on size and complexity: Small tattoos (up to 10cm) take 1-2h. Medium (10-20cm) take 3-4h. Large (20cm+) may need multiple sessions of 4-6h each.

items.question: Do you accept minors?
items.answer: No. Only adults over 18 with valid ID (RG, CNH, or Passport). We make no exceptions, even with parental authorization.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept: Credit card (up to 12x), Debit card, PIX, Bank transfer, Cash. For international payments: Stripe, PayPal, Wise.

items.question: Do I need to bring anything on the day?
items.answer: Yes: Photo ID, Deposit payment proof, Reference images (if any), Comfortable clothing allowing access to tattoo area. We recommend eating well before the session.

items.question: How is the healing process?
items.answer: Healing takes 2-4 weeks. We provide a complete aftercare guide, specific ointment, and follow-up via WhatsApp. You will receive automatic reminders about necessary care at each stage.

items.question: Do you do cover-ups?
items.answer: Yes! Danilo is a cover-up specialist. Send photos of the current tattoo for evaluation. Some tattoos may need laser sessions before cover-up for best results.

items.question: Can I bring a companion?
items.answer: Yes, you can bring 1 companion. For long sessions (over 4h), we recommend having someone to support you. Children are not allowed in the studio for safety reasons.

items.question: Is the studio sanitized?
items.answer: Absolutely. We follow all biosafety protocols: Single-use disposable materials, Autoclave sterilization, New gloves and needles for every client, Deep cleaning between every session. We have sanitary surveillance certification.

items.question: Can I get a tattoo if I have allergies?
items.answer: Depends on the allergy type. We inform all allergies in the health form. We use vegan and hypoallergenic inks. For severe allergies, we recommend a patch test 48h prior.

items.question: How much does a tattoo cost?
items.answer: Price varies by size, complexity, colors, and location. Small tattoos: R$ 300-800. Medium: R$ 800-2000. Large: R$ 2000+. Request a personalized quote by sending your idea and references.

items.question: Do you give online quotes?
items.answer: Yes! Send reference photos, detailed description, approximate size, and body location. We respond within 24h with an estimated quote. For more precise quotes, schedule a free in-person consultation.
